Gantar，去的人。（“goer” in gantā hoti he will go，he is in the habit of going）。

Gantar，[n．agent of gacchati in the sense of a periphrastic future] “goer” in gantā hoti he will go，he is in the habit of going，comb<sup>d</sup> w．sotā hantā khantā，of the king’s elephant A.II，116=III，161； v．l．for gatā at M.II，155．（Page 243）
